issue.title: [CF 1636] 8.5.7 has missed PvP-Spells and MiscHelpfulBuffs equivs
issue.body:
Actually what's the point of removing it? It seems to be practical and convenient, it did not bother


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos | Imported from CurseForge issue #1636 | Raw

comments.body:
They were removed because they lacked clear purpose and hadn't been updated in a long time.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
